name: The Haunting of Naruhodou Ryuunosuke
description:
MAJOR SPOILERS FOR DAI GYAKUTEN SAIBAN/THE GREAT ACE ATTORNEY. THIS PROJECT IS A WORK IN PROGRESS.

Ever since arriving in London, Ryuunosuke has been plagued by strange and sometimes dangerous incidents. His friends have taken note, and even strangers have started to gossip that 221B Baker Street is haunted. Something is going on, but what exactly is happening, and how much of it is connected to the death of his best friend?

Character names use the original versions and spellings from DGS. This story functions on mobile devices, but may have layout issues.
